thread.title: ANA expands China network
thread.title_full: ANA expands China network | Buying Business Travel

title: ANA expands China network
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Tue, 4 Aug 2015 10:13 Follow @thomasnewcombe ANA is increasing services to China from October when it launches its expanded winter schedule.
The Japanese airline will launch a new route from Haneda to Guangzhou and boost frequency on its Haneda to Beijing and Shanghai services to twice-daily.
The decision to increase services from Haneda follows the successful outcome of intergovernmental talks between Japan and China in this May.
The new service to Guangzhou will be ANA’s fourth route from Haneda to major cities in China including Hong Kong.
ANA won Best Long-Haul airline at this year’s Business Travel Awards.
